translations: n.牛奶；白细胞黏附抑制试验

phrs.translation: 白细胞黏附抑制试验, 交通灯
欧蕾咖啡, 牛奶咖啡, 贵夫人欧蕾咖啡, 法式咖啡
咖啡牛乳色斑, 咖啡牛奶色素斑
咖啡牛乳色斑, 翻译

sentences.sentence: Our love will lait as long as our lives.
She was not coal or piccaninny black; she was “dusky”, “sepia”, “milk-chocolate”, café au lait.
sentences.translation: 她不是黢黑或者墨黑那种黑，而是黝黑，亮黑，巧克力牛奶或咖啡牛奶式的黑。

sentences.sentence: Pain au Lait, a milky and soft bread, filled with ripped tomatoes, fresh mozzarella and arugula drizzled with homemade pesto and olive oil.
sentences.translation: 白面包配上芝麻菜色拉和新鲜番茄和新鲜意大利干酪最后淋上橄榄油。
